## About the Project
This set of lessons began as a pilot for the Virginia Open Data and Technology Curriculum and Platform (VOCP), a Commonwealth Provostsâ€™ Initiative In Integrated Economic Development. The VOCP is an online, cloud-hosted, virtual environment intended to provide free education resources and a configured cloud environment (operating system, tools, data environment) for an instructor and their students.

[Kendall Giles](https://ece.vt.edu/people/profile/giles) (Virginia Tech) and [Catherine Anderson](https://datascience.virginia.edu/people/catherine-anderson) (UVA) are the PIs. [Michele Claibourn](https://data.library.virginia.edu/michele-claibourn/) (UVA) is generating the initial curricular content.
